segments.text: Lisa wins the first prize in the English speech contest of her college .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's really wonderful . I'm so happy for her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I always feel disappointed . I have many problems with English learning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel confused about the grammars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you'll do fine if you try your best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And my writing is not good . I feel so frustrated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be confident , and never give up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that , mom . But sometimes I'm just sad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep your chin up . Remember ? Nothing is impossible to a willing heart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , mom . You are right . Nothing is impossible to a willing heart . I will keep going .
segments.speaker: S1
